fields_of_interest: Consumers, Business and Industry, Environment, Single market, Research and innovation, Public Health, Food Safety, Digital economy and society, Transport, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: Chemicals legislation REFIT (Reach, CLP), Detergents Regulation (648/2004) REFIT, Aerosol Dispensors Directive 75/324/CEE) Evaluation, Packaging & Packaging Waste Directive (94/62/EC), Waste Framework Directive (2008/98/EC) and Circular Economy Package, Cosmetic Products Regulation and other related regulation, Unfair Commercial Practices Directive
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership:
A.I.S.E. aisbl

goals__remit:
DETIC represent three sectors: Cosmetics, Detergents & maintenance products and Adhesives & Sealants in Belgium and Luxemburg. 
DETIC provides supports to her members for Technical-Regulatory Affairs and Communication & Sustainability.
relevant_communication: Following on activities organised by our European organisations (A.I.S.E., Cosmetics Europe, FEA, FEICA)
